page.title: 05A day at school 2
page.content:
During the morning we have a playtime of about 15 minutes. Morning school ends at 12.00 noon. Nearly all of the children stay at school for luch, only three people in the whole school go home. About half of us have school dinners and the other half of us bring packed lunches. We sit in the main assembly hall to eat. As there isn't enough room for all of us at once there are two sittings.
Quite a few extra lessons are given at lunch time, though not at the same time as we are eating! There are recorder lessons, guitar, chess, dancing and netball and football practice.
Afternoon school starts properly at 1.15 pm.
